thread.title: Infinigy Acquires Connell Design Group, LLC
thread.title_full: Infinigy Acquires Connell Design Group, LLC

author: Janet Gill
title: Infinigy Acquires Connell Design Group, LLC
text:
Infinigy Solutions LLC, a leading telecommunications technical services company that delivers design-driven turnkey solutions to the wireless industry, announces the acquisition of Connell Design Group (CDG), a telecommunications engineering consulting firm located in Lake Forest, California. “This strategic acquisition is part of Infinigy’s growth strategy and long-term business plan,” said John Stevens, CEO of Infinigy. “This new team strengthens our presence in California and increases bandwidth to continue offering exceptional engineering solutions to the West Coast market.”
Dan and Karen Connell, Co-Founders of Connell Design Group, have a core staff representing over 60 years in telecommunications site design. Founded in 2001, Connell Design Group has been very successful as a family business within wireless that also serves the residential and commercial sector growing Infinigy’s diverse client base. The company will remain at the same location and retain their employee team. Dan Connell will be a Partner with Infinigy and his brother, Joe Connell, will serve as Project Manager – both staying at this location to run the California office.
Joe Dean, Vice President of Sales/Principal at Infinigy adds, “Our acquisition of Connell Design Group enhances Infinigy’s ability to provide stronger engineering services to the West region. We have a strategic focus and commitment in growing our vertical markets and this addition to our strong wireless, government and utility sectors was a natural acquisition.”
For more information on Infinigy and their engineering services, visit infinigy.com.
